name: SickBall
description:
To play this game you need 3 players and 3 game pads. However to view beautiful win dance animation you can just wait 30 seconds to game over.

Game is about infecting other people (transmitteing bacteria tbh)

#GlobalGameJam #PolyJom2018

Credits:

Wojciech Płatek "Wowo"

Melchior Moroz "Melc.mo"
